steps.value: Given I am on main application page
When I change window size to `${resolution}`
When I save `content` attribute value of element located `elementName(version):a` to ((story)) variable `ui-version`
When I go to relative URL `/my-cases?search=all`
When I wait until element located by `testId(jnj-create-new-case-button)` appears

scenarios.title: check left panel default state

steps.value: When I change context to element located `testId(jnj-navigation-side-bar)`

When I ((${visual-action})) baseline with name `${profile}-${resolution}-cases-left-bar-default` ignoring:［
|ELEMENT                                                            |
|By.xpath(//*[@data-test-id='jnj-navigation-side-bar-list-item']//p)|］
using screenshot configuration:
|shootingStrategy|cutRight               |
|SIMPLE          |${context-x-coordinate}|
When I reset context

scenarios.title: check main form

steps: When I click on element located by `testId(<button-id>)`
When I change context to element located `By.xpath(<xpath>)`

When I ${visual-action} baseline with name `${profile}-${resolution}-my-cases-#{extractQueryFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` ignoring:
|AREA                         |
|By.testID(jnj-grid-cases-box)|

steps.value: When I click on element located by `testId(((jnj-navigation-side-bar-list-item-3)))`
Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}?#{extractQueryFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is ((equal to)) `((/my-cases?search=shared))`
When I change context to element located `By.xpath(((//*[@data-test-id='jnj-empty-state-component']/../..)))`

When I ((${visual-action})) baseline with name `${profile}-${resolution}-my-cases-#{extractQueryFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` ignoring:［
|AREA                         |
|By.testID(jnj-grid-cases-box)|］
When I reset context

steps.value: When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-create-new-case-button)`
When I wait until element located by `caseSensitiveText(Select Case Type)` appears
Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is ((equal to)) `/new-case`
